scripts.deploy:dev: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.invoke:birthday: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f birthday --env dev
scripts.invoke:completionNotice: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f completionNotice
scripts.invoke:coronaHannover: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local SLS_DEBUG=*  NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f coronaHannover
scripts.invoke:eventApplication: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f eventApplication
scripts.invoke:lockProject: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f lockProject
scripts.invoke:mailSignature: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f mailSignature
scripts.invoke:unlockProject: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f unlockProject
scripts.invoke:workload: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f workload
scripts.invoke:workloadAll: DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=.env.local NODE_OPTIONS='-r dotenv/config' serverless invoke local -f workloadAll
